item.title: Smaller companies can benefit from Cisco's advanced firewall security
item.description: Source: Cisco website. Some members of the Cisco ASA with FirePOWER Services family. Cisco has introduced new Cisco ASA with FirePOWER Services models designed for small to mid-sized businesses and branch offices. These models offer the same advanced malware protection and threat detection used by larger organizations. A recent study by PwC revealed a 64% increase in security breaches among mid-sized organizations in 2014. These organizations face similar security challenges as larger enterprises when safeguarding their network and data.
